      • showSaveConfirmation

        public int showSaveConfirmation()
        Show a "Would you like to save your changes?" Yes/No confirmation dialog.
        Returns:
        -1 if the user closed the dialog. 0 if the user clicked Yes. 1 if the user clicked No.
